item.title: How To Change Welcome Message
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:2, topic:436675”][quote author=ProjectCustom link=topic=539391.msg3947604#msg3947604 date=1332017917]

If I Helped Please Rep++
[/quote]
How about rep–

There is no need for this, it’s a snippet and it’s common sense[/quote]

^^ That + this is only for some bases not all for example in Hyperion there is no client.java so this is completely and utterly useless Here is a better tutorial : Get Eclipse Start A New Project Import Your Source, Search For Whatever You Need To Find <-- WAY more efficient

item.title: How To Change Welcome Message
item.dc:creator: @ProjectCustom ProjectCustom
item.description:
@ProjectCustom wrote:

Red:Key Information
Black:basic Information

Step 1.Open Up “Client.java” File And Search “Welcome To”

getTotalLevel(); specAttack(); l33thax(12323); l33thax(7574); l33thax(7599); l33thax(7549); l33thax(8493); l33thax(7499); sM("Welcome to @bla@Zila-Scape."); isRunning = true; isRunning2 = true;

Step 2.Change It To Your Server’s Name.

getTotalLevel(); specAttack(); l33thax(12323); l33thax(7574); l33thax(7599); l33thax(7549); l33thax(8493); l33thax(7499); sM("Welcome to ProjectCustom."); isRunning = true; isRunning2 = true;

Step 3.Compile And Your Done.

If I Helped Please Red++

Read full topic
